attributes.action: Change the law regarding criminal acts by minors so that they can be prosecuted and brought to justice when a crime has been committed.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is my belief that the modern attitude amongst youngsters today of a feeling invincibility has been brought about by the fact they cannot be charged and given a custodial sentence or have their freedoms curtailed when a crime has been committed by a minor under the age of 16. Crimes such as Vandalism are a blight on our society and the people responsible give the area where they live a bad reputation.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
